text: Gerald Lee Baliles (July 8, 1940 â€“ October 29, 2019) was an American politician and lawyer. He was the 65th Governor of Virginia from 1986 to 1990. He was the state's Attorney General from 1982 to 1985 and was in the Virginia House of Delegates. Baliles died on October 29, 2019 under hospice care in Charlottesville, Virginia at the age of 79.Former Governor Gerald Baliles passes away He had kidney cancer and pulmonary fibrosis at the time of his death. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from kidney cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Virginia Category:Deaths from pulmonary fibrosis Category:Lawyers from Virginia Category:Governors of Virginia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Gerald Baliles
